mapper.insert: insert into coaching_program_boards( coach_no, program_no, title, content, create_date ) values( #{coachNo}, #{programNo}, #{title}, #{content}, now() )
mapper.select: select program_board_no, coach_no, program_no, content, create_date from coaching_program_boards where program_board_no=#{coach_no}

select cpb.program_board_no, cpb.coach_no, cpb.program_no, cpb.title, cpb.content, DATE_FORMAT(cpb.create_date, "%Y/%m/%d %h:%i %p") as create_date, m.member_no, m.id, m.name, m.gender, m.birth, m.tel, m.email, m.photo, cp.name as program_name from coaching_program_boards cpb left outer join member_coaching_programs mcp on cpb.program_no = mcp.program_no AND cpb.create_date between mcp.start_date AND mcp.end_date left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no = cpb.program_no where cpb.coach_no=#{no} order by cpb.create_date DESC

select cpb.program_board_no, cpb.coach_no, cpb.program_no, cpb.title, cpb.content, DATE_FORMAT(cpb.create_date, "%Y/%m/%d %h:%i %p") as create_date, m.member_no, m.id, m.name, m.gender, m.birth, m.tel, m.email, m.photo, cp.name as program_name from coaching_program_boards cpb left outer join member_coaching_programs mcp on cpb.program_no = mcp.program_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no = cpb.program_no left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no where cpb.program_board_no=#{no}
